movie.title: Thudarum
movie.about: In the quiet hill town of Ranni, Pathanamthitta, Shanmughan navigates life as a humble taxi driver. His heart belongs to one...Pathanamthitta, Shanmughan navigates life as a humble taxi driver

movie.title: Chotta Mumbai
movie.about: Chotta Mumbai follows Vasco da Gama and his gang of small-time goons in Kochi who get entangled in a web of politics, crime, and chaos. A mix of high-energy comedy and action with a street-smart spirit.

topReviews.content: Mohanlal‚Äôs timing and energy carry this film effortlessly. One of the most entertaining movies of the 2000s!
#GreatActing #MassComedy Mohanlal and Jagathy combo is legendary. Anwar Rasheed made a solid entertainer.

movie.title: Thug Life
movie.about: Thug Life is an upcoming Indian action-drama film written and directed by Kamal Haasan, who also stars in the lead role. The film marks the reunion of the iconic actor with director Mani Ratnam after over three decades. The plot remains under wraps, but it's set in a raw and gritty world involving powerful gang lords and political undertones.

topReviews.content: A cinematic event in the making! Kamal + Mani + ARR is the holy trinity of Tamil cinema. Expectations sky-high!
#ThugMood #StarPower Can't wait to watch this in theaters. Looks gritty and explosive. Hope it delivers.

movie.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movie.about: A live-action adaptation of the beloved animated saga, 'How to Train Your Dragon' (2025) reimagines the origin story of Hiccup and Toothless. Set in the Viking island of Berk, it follows a misfit boy who befriends a feared dragon, changing the fate of both their worlds.

topReviews.content: I'm so ready to see Toothless in live-action! Hoping they stay true to the magic of the original trilogy.
#DragonsReturn A new take on a classic. Curious how they‚Äôll handle the bond between Hiccup and Toothless in live-action.

movie.title: Karate Kid: Legends
movie.about: Karate Kid: Legends (2025) is an action-packed addition to the legendary martial arts saga. The film unites Jackie Chan and Ralph Macchio from two generations of Karate Kid stories and introduces a new student navigating discipline, honor, and self-discovery in a modern-day setting blending East and West.

topReviews.content: #KarateLegacy Lives on! Seeing Jackie Chan and Ralph together is a dream. Super hyped for Ben Wang‚Äôs debut.
This is going to be epic. A true passing of the torch moment. Trailer already gave me chills!

movie.title: Ballerina
movie.about: Ballerina is a spin-off from the John Wick universe, centering on a young female assassin who seeks vengeance against those who killed her family. Set between the events of John Wick: Chapter 3 and Chapter 4, the film blends intense action and emotional grit in the world of contract killers.

topReviews.content: Ana de Armas is born to be in action roles. Seeing her take on the Wick universe is a thrill.
#BallerinaRevenge + #WickVerse = fire. The trailer alone gave me goosebumps. This is going to be intense.

movie.title: Mission: Impossible ‚Äì The Final Reckoning
movie.about: In the climactic conclusion to Ethan Hunt‚Äôs decades-long mission, 'Mission: Impossible ‚Äì The Final Reckoning' follows Hunt and his team as they confront their most personal and dangerous threat yet‚Äîwhere trust is scarce, and betrayal runs deep. The future of global security rests on the line in a finale that ties together threads from across the franchise.

topReviews.content: Tom Cruise never misses. The end of an era, and I‚Äôm all here for it. Intense, emotional, and stunningly executed.
#FinalMission lived up to the hype. It ties together so many loose ends, while still being a high-octane thrill ride.

movie.title: Baahubali: The Beginning
movie.about: Baahubali: The Beginning follows Shivudu, a free-spirited young man who discovers his royal legacy and fights to rescue Devasena and uphold justice against tyranny in the Mahishmati kingdom.

topReviews.content: An epic superhero-like tale set in a glorious mythical kingdom ‚Äî stunning visuals and storytelling at its best!
Prabhas carries the film with genuine heroism, backed by a fabulous ensemble and legendary action.

movie.title: Runway
movie.about: Runway is a 2004 Indian Malayalam-language action thriller film directed by Joshiy and written by Udayakrishna‚ÄìSibi K. Thomas. The film stars Dileep as Unni Damodhar, who becomes a smuggler under the alias Valayar Paramasivam to support his family. The story explores his double life and the emotional toll it takes.

topReviews.content: One of Dileep's finest performances in a gripping action role. Joshiy's direction stands out.
Runway gave us the iconic Valayar Paramasivam. It's dramatic, action-packed, and memorable.

movie.title: Christian Brothers
movie.about: Christian Brothers is a Malayalam action thriller that revolves around a retired police officer and his four children. When one of them goes missing, it sets off a chain of events filled with action, deceit, and drama involving family ties and crime syndicates.

topReviews.content: A big-budget multistarrer that lives up to the hype. Mohanlal is excellent as always.
Well-paced and entertaining. The action sequences and emotional scenes are both handled well.

movie.title: Spider-Man
movie.about: Spider-Man (2002) is the first film in Sam Raimi's trilogy and introduces Peter Parker, a high school student who gains superpowers after being bitten by a genetically modified spider. The movie follows his transformation into Spider-Man and his battle against the Green Goblin.

topReviews.content: An iconic superhero film that laid the foundation for the modern Marvel era. Tobey was perfect.
Kirsten Dunst and Tobey Maguire had real chemistry. Loved every swing and fight scene.

movie.title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
movie.about: K.G.F: Chapter 2 continues the saga of Rocky, whose name now strikes fear in the heart of his foes. With the Kolar Gold Fields under his control, Rocky must now maintain his dominance while facing threats from all sides ‚Äî including the ruthless Adheera and the government.

topReviews.content: Blockbuster! Yash delivers a powerhouse performance and the action is top-notch.
The buildup and intensity throughout the film kept me hooked. A must-watch for action lovers!

movie.title: SiTaare Zameen Par
movie.about: Taare Zameen Par is a touching story of an 8-year-old boy, Ishaan, who struggles in school due to undiagnosed dyslexia. His world changes when a new art teacher, Ram Shankar Nikumbh, recognizes his learning disability and helps him discover his true potential.

topReviews.content: An unforgettable film that brings awareness and emotion together beautifully. Aamir Khan's direction is heartfelt.
A must-watch for every parent and teacher. Darsheel Safary is phenomenal.

movie.title: Housefull 5
movie.about: The fifth installment in the Housefull franchise is set aboard a luxury cruise where three impostors claiming to be billionaire Mr. Dobriyal‚Äôs heirs vie for his fortune. Amid hilarious chaos, a murder mystery unfolds into a full-blown comedic whodunit with classic twists and mistaken identities.

topReviews.content: Early reactions call it a wild blend of slapstick, suspense, and nostalgia. A true Housefull chaos!
Packed with double roles and one-liners, it‚Äôs expected to please die-hard fans of the franchise.

movie.title: The Godfather
movie.about: The Godfather chronicles the powerful Italian-American crime family of Don Vito Corleone. When the aging patriarch passes control of his empire to his reluctant son Michael, a saga of power, betrayal, and transformation unfolds. The film is widely considered one of the greatest in cinematic history.

topReviews.content: A masterpiece in every sense. Brando‚Äôs performance is legendary, and Pacino‚Äôs transformation is iconic.
A defining moment in American cinema. Every frame is masterful.

movie.title: The Dark Knight
movie.about: The Dark Knight follows Bruce Wayne as Batman as he teams up with police lieutenant James Gordon and district attorney Harvey Dent to dismantle organized crime in Gotham. Their efforts are upended by the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges the city into chaos.

topReviews.content: Heath Ledger's Joker is legendary. Nolan delivers a dark, deep, and thrilling masterpiece.
Every frame of this film is gripping. An instant classic that transcends superhero movies.
